text: 'iidha ra'aa bed almuslimin tijaratan 'aw shyyana min lahu aldunya wazinatuha tfrraqu 'ilyha, watarakuk -ayha alnby- qaymana ealaa alminbar tkhtb, qul lhm-ayha alnby-: ma eind allah min althawab walneym anfe lakum min allahw wamin altjart, wallh- whdh- khayr man rizq waeta, fatlbu mnh, wastaeinuu btaeth ealaa nyl ma eindah min khayri aldunya walakhrt
